author: DARLENE SUPERVILLE Associated Press
title: Trump's developer friend Stanley Chera dies of coronavirus
description: President Donald Trump's friend and donor, real estate developer Stanley Chera, has died after becoming infected with the coronavirus
content:
WASHINGTON -- 
A friend and donor to President Donald Trump who the president had said was in a coma and seriously ill after becoming infected with the coronavirus has died.
Stanley I. Chera's death Saturday was reported by The Real Deal, which covers the N… [+2500 chars]
